home.title: Hi, I'm
home.text2: I love turning beautiful designs into functional interfaces

about me.p1: 🙋🏼‍♀️ I'm a full-stack developer from Córdoba, Argentina, with a background in accounting. I'm passionate about coding and always learning.
about me.p2: 🚀 After obtaining my accounting degree, I dove into programming out of curiosity and found my true passion. I joined the Soy Henry's bootcamp to further develop my skills.
about me.p3: 🎨 I'm highly creative and enjoy crafting visually and functionally appealing experiences. I thrive in teamwork, contributing my skills to achieve shared goals.
about me.p4: 🌟 Currently I’m working for the Chilean startup Canal Cero, primarily using WordPress and continuously improving my skills on the platform. I'm always eager to learn new tools.

contact.title: Let's talk
contact.form-title: Have any project in mind? Leave me a message!
